name: Cogneto.io
tagline: Let us help power your user experiences
description: You're the next big thing. You have the killer app. The mother of all platforms to take apps to the next level or a hosting service that is so hot it should come with oven gloves to use it. Having the hottest service in town isn't enough. You've to earn your user's confidence. Imagine a company whose services are designed towards how you manage your user experiences. Yup, that's what we do.
